```{r warning=F}
library(readr)
library(data.table)
library(plotly)
```
```{r}
hf_pt <- read_delim("cerner_hf_data/hf_labs-selected_pt_OUT.tsv",delim = "\t")
setDT(hf_pt)
head(hf_pt)
```
```{r}
sprintf("Encounters: %s", hf_pt[, uniqueN(encounter_id)])
```


```{r}
table(hf_pt[, gender])
```


```{r}
table(hf_pt[, patient_type_desc])
```
```{r}
plot_ly(x = hf_pt[, age_in_years]), type = "histogram")
```
